title: Ep 107: The Judgies Invest in SOUP-TUBE
description:
Go to SmartAss and Sass and use code JUDGIES15 for 15% off a new subscription.

In This Episode: Josh throws us a curve ball starting with a listener submitted story! We have a listener drags their partner for not listening to the Podcast, the next listener has a boss who made their neighbors chicken disappear, a game of Cards Against Humanity leads to a real shit situation, we read about a woman who regrets her younger self's "Farm Life" lifestyle, a bozo thinks working at Hooter's is going to get him laid, and girlfriend doesn't want to support her boyfriend's revolutionary invention! And for this week's Circle Jerdge we look at our May poop data in JULY!

Get Judgies Merch Here:
https://www.bonfire.com/store/the-judgies-podcast/

Our Patreon is officially open, if you want to see extra content go check it out!
https://www.patreon.com/JudgiesPod

Send us mail! (Addressed However You'd Like)
P.O. Box 58 Ottawa, IL 61350

Leave a Review!
https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-judgies/id1519741238

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/judgiespod
Follow us on Instagram: https://instagram.com/judgiespod

Intro Music by: Iván
https://open.spotify.com/artist/5gB2VvyqfnOlNv37PHKRNJ?si=f6TIYrLITkG2NZXGLm_Y-Q&dl_branch=1

13:52 My Boss kidnaps a chicken

31:29 Return from the Break
32:09 Circle Jerdge: May poop data

46:42 Working at Hooter's hasn't got me laid yet!
